page.title: 07Elmwood Community Centre
page.content: Elmwood is a large Victorian house in Hartburn .When it was built it was a rich persons home.It has many large rooms.The house,the outbuildings and the extensive grounds are now used as a community centre.The centre caters for all age ranges.There are many different clubs and activities every day.For the local old people ,meals are provided and there are many activities including Old Time dancing singing and bingo.There is also a large Youth Club and a football field at the back. Awarden and a number of other people are employed at the centre while about 100 volunteers assist
